channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Endpoint Manager for Security and Compliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Endpoint Manager for Security and Compliance

item.title: CVE-2017-1196|2024-08-05T13:25:17.447Z -- ibm -- endpoint%20manager%20for%20security%20and%20compliance
item.description: IBM BigFix Compliance (TEMA SUAv1 SCA SCM) 1.9.70 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 123671.

item.title: CVE-2017-1178|2024-08-05T13:25:17.420Z -- ibm -- endpoint%20manager%20for%20security%20and%20compliance
item.description: IBM Endpoint Manager for Security and Compliance 1.9.70 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 123430.
